File.AllUsersWebPart: <webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Contoso.TrainingManagement.WebParts.TrainingBudgetWebPart, Contoso.TrainingManagement, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=9f4da00116c38ec5" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import Contoso Training Budget Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Title" type="string">Contoso Training Budget</property> <property name="Description" type="string">The Contoso Training Budget Web Part will display total budget, remaining budget, and a list of transactions, grouped by cost center.</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Contoso.TrainingManagement.WebParts.DirectReportsWebPart, Contoso.TrainingManagement, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=9f4da00116c38ec5" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import Contoso Direct Reports Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Title" type="string">Contoso Direct Reports</property> <property name="Description" type="string">The Contoso Direct Reports Web Part displays all direct reports for the current user.</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>
